name: KickRedBall
description:
Puzzle-Game is here!

KickRedBall - puzzle, where you kick red ball to finish line by mouse. But don't forget about lava, that ball will be backed in begining place.

What platform can I play?

You have 3 type of downloading Game. If you have macOS or Linux, then download JAR. Warning: It's Java game. You must have Java in computer.

How can I help you?

You can donate me in this site: https://www.donationalerts.com/r/pekaeboy

It's still Demo. If you like it, then I will continue development
